Authors:
K. N. Anil Raja, K. P. Deepna Latha, Marisol
Sanchez-Garcia, P. Manimohan
Title:
A new species of the genus Corneriella from India supported
by morphological and molecular data
Abstract:
Corneriella indica sp. nov. is described from Kerala
State, India. Comprehensive description, photographs, and comparisons
with phenetically similar species are provided. Phylogenetic analysis
based on the sequences of both nuclear ribosomal large subunit and
nuclear internal transcribed spacer region supported the generic
placement and species validity of C. indica. This forms the first record
of the genus Corneriella from South Asia.
